name: Hogwarts Legacy Purchase Simulator
description:
Hogwarts Legacy Purchase Simulator Quest to save the workers Playable on your browser with no download, works on desktop or mobile The game is a few minutes long

You must purchase as many copies of Hogwarts Legacy as you can to save the workers from devastation!!!

Note: this is a parody game against transphobia

If you want I'm on Twitter , Mastodon or Cohost

This game was made in Narrat engine - Make your own games like this easily with it. The game is also open source if for any reason you want to see the source code
